flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
電気に　引き寄せられる　性質を　持つ。
主に　発電所に　集まってきて　つくった
ばかりの　電気を　食べてしまう　困りものだ。

One of Electrode’s characteristics is its attraction to electricity.
It is a problematical Pokémon that congregates mostly at
electrical power plants to feed on electricity that has just
been generated.

Una delle caratteristiche di Electrode è la sua affinità con
l’elettricità. Si tratta di un Pokémon problematico che spesso
si raduna attorno alle centrali elettriche per trarre nutrimento
dall’elettricità appena generata.

Una de las características de Electrode es la atracción que
siente hacia la electricidad. Son Pokémon problemáticos que
suelen agruparse cerca de centrales eléctricas para nutrirse
de la energía recién generada.

Typisch für Lektrobal ist seine große Faszination für Elektrizität.
Es ist ein problematisches Pokémon, das sich meistens in
Kraftwerken niederlässt, wo es sich von frisch erzeugtem Strom
ernähren kann.

L’une des caractéristiques d’Électrode est son attirance
pour l’électricité. Ces Pokémon posent problème lorsqu’ils
se rassemblent dans les centrales électriques pour se nourrir
de courant fraîchement généré.

전기에 끌리는 성질을 지녔다.
주로 발전소에 모여서 막 만들어진
전기를 먹어버리는 말썽꾼이다.

でんきに　ひきよせられる　せいしつを　もつ。
おもに　はつでんしょに　あつまってきて　つくった
ばかりの　でんきを　たべてしまう　こまりものだ。

空気中の　電気エネルギーを　食べる。
カミナリの　落ちる　日は　電気を　食べ過ぎた
マルマインが　あちらこちらで　大爆発する。

Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when
lightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all over
the place from eating too much electricity.

Electrode si nutre dell’elettricità presente nell’atmosfera.
Quando i fulmini solcano il cielo, è possibile scorgere molti
di questi Pokémon esplodere per aver ingerito un’eccessiva
dose di elettricità.

Los Electrode se alimentan de la electricidad de la atmósfera.
En días de tormenta con rayos, es fácil verlos explotando por
todos lados tras haber consumido demasiada electricidad.

Lektrobal ernährt sich von Elektrizität aus der Atmosphäre.
An Tagen, an denen es blitzt, explodiert dieses Pokémon
dauernd, da es zu viel Elektrizität zu sich nimmt.

Électrode mange l’électricité qui se trouve dans l’atmosphère.
Les jours d’orage, on peut voir ce Pokémon exploser
sans arrêt parce qu’il a avalé trop d’électricité.

공기 중의 전기 에너지를 먹는다.
번개가 치는 날에는 전기를 너무 먹은
붐볼이 이곳저곳에서 대폭발한다.

くうきちゅうの　でんきエネルギーを　たべる。
カミナリの　おちる　ひは　でんきを　たべすぎた
マルマインが　あちらこちらで　だいばくはつする。

あふれるほどの　電気エネルギーを
体内に　ためこんでいるので
少しの　刺激で　爆発する。

It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy
inside its body. Even a small shock makes
it explode.

Dato che accumula nel proprio corpo un’incredibile
quantità di elettricità, esplode alla minima
provocazione.

Almacena una enorme cantidad de electricidad en su
cuerpo. Una pequeña sacudida le hará explotar.

Es speichert eine riesige Menge Elektrizität in
seinem Körper. Es explodiert beim kleinsten Ruck.

Il stocke tellement d’énergie dans son corps
qu’une simple secousse peut le faire exploser.

넘칠 정도의 전기 에너지를
체내에 모으고 있기 때문에
약간의 자극만으로도 폭발한다.

あふれるほどの　でんきエネルギーを
たいないに　ためこんでいるので
すこしの　しげきで　ばくはつする。

少しの　刺激に　反応して
爆発する。バクダンボールという
あだ名で　怖がられている。

It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is
feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”

Può esplodere anche alla minima provocazione.
Lo chiamano “Bomba Ball”.

Explotan a la mínima. Por eso se les tiene mucho
miedo. Estos Pokémon reciben el mote de Bomba Ball.

Es explodiert schon bei kleinsten Reizen.
Sein Spitzname „Die Bombenkugel“ spiegelt
die Furcht der Menschen wider.

Il explose au moindre choc. Son seul surnom de
« Bomb Ball » suffit à effrayer ses adversaires.

작은 자극에도 반응해서
폭발한다. 폭탄볼이라 불리며
두려움의 대상이 되고 있다.

すこしの　しげきに　はんのうして
ばくはつする。バクダンボールという
あだなで　こわがられて　いる。

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

Il se laisse porter par les vents
lorsque son corps est gonflé
d’électricité à en éclater.

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

Il se laisse porter par les vents
lorsque son corps est gonflé
d’électricité à en éclater.

It stores an overflowing amount of
electric energy inside its body.
Even a small shock makes it explode.

It is dangerous. If it has too much
electricity and has nothing to do,
it amuses itself by exploding.

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

It is known to drift on winds if it
is bloated to bursting with stored
electricity.

It stores electric energy under very high
pressure. It often explodes with little or
no provocation.

It explodes in response to even minor
stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname
of “The Bomb Ball.”

They appear in great numbers at electric
power plants. Because they feed on
electricity, they cause massive and
chaotic blackouts in nearby cities.

One of ELECTRODE’s characteristics is
its attraction to electricity.
It is a problematical POKéMON that congregates mostly at electrical
power plants to feed on electricity
that has just been generated.

ELECTRODE eats electricity in the
atmosphere. On days when lightning
strikes, you can see this POKéMON exploding all over the place from
eating too much electricity.

The more energy it
charges up, the
faster it gets. But this also
makes it more
likely to explode.

It stores an over­
flowing amount of
electric energy inside its body.
Even a small shock
makes it explode.

It is dangerous.
If it has too much
electricity and has nothing to do,
it amuses itself
by exploding.

Stores electrical
energy inside its
body. Even the slightest shock
could trigger a
huge explosion.

It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.
